basic.Peptide Name: msHemerycin (Ms-Hemerycin, the N-terminal fragment of hemerythrin; natural AMPs; Lugworm; nematode, invertebrate, animals; XXE; UCLL1)
basic.Target Organism: Active against both Gram+ (B. subtilis KCTC1021) and Gram- bacteria (E. coli). Note that although the purified peptide (native) showed potent antimicrobial activity, synthetic peptide did not show any antimicrobial activity.
